intro: Dendroviguiera, commonly known as the tree hibiscus, is a genus of flowering plants in the mallow family, Malvaceae. It comprises several species, primarily found in tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. Dendroviguiera species are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their vibrant floral displays.
